title: lucli in contrib lacking run.sh
description:
The README in contrib/lucli is unhelpful. It calls for a run of ant, but there's no source or build, and it describes a run.sh, but there's none of them.

It has dependencies that aren't mentioned in the README and aren't provided, except in the passing reference to jline.

comments.content: For some reason the missing files are in the source tarball but not the binary tarball.
comments.author: Carlo Cabanilla

comments.content: The build.xml builds correctly with ant. Is this still a problem?
comments.author: Joe Cabrera
